heroSubtitle: Empowering innovators to build resilient solutions for crisis management, passive defense, and social preparedness.

tracksCard.title: Tracks
tracksCard.text: Browse the thematic tracks and pick the best fit.

defense.title: Enhancing Defense Capability in Emergencies
defense.desc: Focus on innovative solutions to strengthen national resilience, reduce infrastructure vulnerabilities, and ensure comprehensive preparedness against crises and unexpected threats.

cyberDefense.title: Innovation in Cyber Power and Active/Passive Defense
cyberDefense.desc: Development of advanced cyber and defense technologies, including intelligent systems, active and passive defense mechanisms, to counter hybrid threats and complex attacks.

aiInCrisis.title: Utilizing AI Capabilities in Crisis (Across All Domains)
aiInCrisis.desc: Applying artificial intelligence and machine learning algorithms for monitoring, data analysis, and predicting critical conditions to accelerate decision-making and effective response.

crisisSupport.title: Crisis-Time Services & Support (Clothing, Food, Treatment, Relief)
crisisSupport.desc: Creating innovative models for rapid provision of essential needs, efficient medical and relief services, and improved supply chain management in emergencies.

dataParticipation.title: Novel Uses of Data and Public Participation
dataParticipation.desc: Developing data-driven platforms for crisis monitoring, big data analysis, and enabling smart citizen participation in crisis management with greater transparency.

volunteerNetwork.title: Volunteer Network Management & Facilitating Social Support (Non-financial)
volunteerNetwork.desc: Designing innovative systems to organize, guide, and synergize volunteer capacities for delivering social, psychological, and spiritual support during emergencies.
